text: @HillaryClinton Trump did not cause the Wuhan Virus, or COVID-19 as you like to call it from Agenda 21 headquarters.  He did not act early or late.  You did nothing while he acted, so whatever decision he made it showed leadership and good executive management. You're jealous, that's all.
